name: #SeaJam Minigame Bonanza
description:
#SeaJam Minigame Bonanza is a minigame collection themed around ocean conservation made for the #SeaJam in support of the #TeamSeas initiative. Play a randomly sequenced set of minigames and see how many you can pass before three fails! All games are controlled with the mouse and it's playable right here in the browser so jump in and get going!

Due to a bug we couldn't quite track down in time the browser build only has six minigames included. The downloadable Windows build has the full seven minigames.

Minigames Included:
- Garbage Barge - Race around the ocean collecting garbage out of the water!
- Trash Catch - Fish chunks of floating garbage from out of the water!
- Puzzled - Connect the pieces of these ocean-themed puzzles!
- Oil Spill - Clean up the animals!
- Maze Rescue - Race through the maze and save the trapped critters!
- Endless Swimmer - Avoid the trash floating through the current!
- Pipeline Patch - Fix the holes in this leaky pipe! (only in download build)

#SeaJam Minigame Bonanza is a game created by Applestreet Games.

Resources:
- Freesound.org for sound effects
- Pexels.com for photographs
